rootkeys.bootpass.en:
Password request
Device unlock
Security: Low
Tip: a convenience PIN is OK.
rootkeys.bootpass.zh:
输入密码
解锁
安全含义:低

rootkeys.updatepass.en:
Password request
Software update key
Security: Critical
Tip: use a phrase instead of a word.
rootkeys.updatepass.zh:
输入密码
软件更新
安全含义:至关重要
rootkeys.updatepass.en-audio: Enter update password. This password is critically important.

rootkeys.setup.en:
This will init the root keys.
I'm going to need two
passwords:
 1. Device unlock
 2. Software update
Do not lose them!
rootkeys.setup.zh:
这将初始化根密钥
需要两个密码
1.解锁
2.软件更新
rootkeys.setup.en-audio: This will initialize the root keys. We're going to need two passwords, one for device unlock, and one for software updates.

rootkeys.confirm.en:
You should only proceed
if you have inspected
your device and are ready
to trust it.
rootkeys.confirm.zh:
仅当您准备好信
任此设备时才
应继续
rootkeys.confirm.en-audio: You should only proceed with this operation if you are ready to trust this device.

rootkeys.confirm.no.zh: 我先检查一下,稍后再试
rootkeys.confirm.no.en-audio: I'll try again after inspecting my device.

rootkeys.setup_wait.en:
Initializing keys.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.setup_wait.zh:
现在正在初始化
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.setup_wait.en-audio: Initializing keys. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.note_to_translator.en:
It is important that every message in the `rootkeys.init` series have the same number of lines. Insert dummy 
 characters if you require multi-line translations! Failure to do so can lead to a deadlock situation (read the code for more notes).
rootkeys.init.note_to_translator.zh:
`rootkeys.init` 系列中的每条消息都具有相同的行数，这一点很重要。 如果您需要多行翻译，请插入虚拟 
 字符！
rootkeys.init.note_to_translator.en-audio:
It is important that every message in the `rootkeys.init` series have the same number of lines. Insert dummy 
 characters if you require multi-line translations!

rootkeys.init.signing_loader.en:
Signing loader.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.signing_loader.zh:
签名引导程序
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.signing_loader.en-audio: Signing loader. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.signing_kernel.en:
Signing kernel.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.signing_kernel.zh:
签名内核
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.signing_kernel.en-audio: Signing kernel. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.backup_gateware.en:
Backing up gateware.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.backup_gateware.zh:
备份比特流
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.backup_gateware.en-audio: Backing up gateware. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.patching_keys.en:
Injecting new keys.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.patching_keys.zh:
更换新钥匙
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.patching_keys.en-audio: Injecting new keys. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.verifying_gateware.en:
Verifying new gateware.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.verifying_gateware.zh:
验证比特流
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.verifying_gateware.en-audio: Verifying gateware. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.commit_signatures.en:
Committing signatures.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.commit_signatures.zh:
保存签名
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.commit_signatures.en-audio: Committing signatures. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.unplug_power.en:
Please unplug the charging
cable so I can reboot!
rootkeys.init.unplug_power.zh: 拔下充电线以允许重启!
rootkeys.init.unplug_power.en-audio: Unplug the charging cable so I can reboot!

rootkeys.init.fail_key.en:
FPGA key is wrong:
Perhaps the update
password was entered
incorrectly?
rootkeys.init.fail_key.en-audio: FPGA key is wrong, perhaps the update password was entered incorrectly?

rootkeys.gwup.no_update_found.zh: 未找到有效更新，正在中止!

rootkeys.gwup.inspecting.zh: 正在检查比特流，请稍候...

rootkeys.gwup.viewinfo_tp.en:
Third party image found.
Review details?

rootkeys.gwup_starting.en:
Updating gateware.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.gwup_starting.zh:
现在正在初始化
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.gwup_starting.en-audio: Updating gateware. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.get_update_password.en:
Password request
Software update key
Security: Critical
Why: Gateware update
rootkeys.get_update_password.zh:
输入密码
软件更新
安全含义:至关重要
rootkeys.get_update_password.en-audio: Enter update password, in order to authorize a gateware update.

rootkeys.gwup.finished.en:
Gateware update finished.
Reboot to apply.
rootkeys.gwup.finished.en-audio: Gateware update finished. Reboot to apply.

rootkeys.get_signing_password.en:
Password request
Software update key
Security: Critical
Why: Sign Xous
rootkeys.get_signing_password.zh:
输入密码
软件更新
安全含义:至关重要
rootkeys.get_signing_password.en-audio: Enter update password, in order to authorize a gateware update.

rootkeys.signxous.finished.en:
Xous signing finished.
Reboot to apply.
rootkeys.signxous.finished.en-audio: Xous signing finished. Reboot to apply.

rootkeys.policy_request.en:
Please pick a password
retention policy:
rootkeys.policy_request.en-audio: Please pick a passowrd retention policy.
